title: Indigenous 5G tech stack to be attractive, economical proposition for private telcos too: Sources - Economic Times
content: Indigenous 5G tech stack to be attractive, economical proposition for private telcos too: Sources  Economic Times
description: On the strides taken by India in developing its own 5G technology stack, sources said the indigenous stack being built by CDoT will be a leap of technology, place the country in global league and will also emerge as an attractive and "far more economical" option for private operators.
